subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Rodriguez avoided a tag at the plate with an awkward-looking maneuver, the last-place Athletics rallied against C. C. Sabathia and later scored the go-ahead run on a bases-loaded walk.
snippet: After Rodriguez avoided a tag at the plate with an awkward-looking maneuver, the last-place Athletics rallied against C. C. Sabathia and later scored the go-ahead run on a bases-loaded walk.
